default_ns_accounts_payable.description: Which account a bill should be paid from

default_ns_filecabinet_folder_id.description: Which folder invoice and bill attachments are saved into within a Netsuite file cabinet

default_ns_sales_rep.description: Which sales rep should be associated with an invoice when it is first created

default_ns_subsidiary_customer.description: The subsidiary customer that all customers should be created under

default_ns_vendor_payment_terms.description: When creating a Vendor, what payment terms that vendor should be associated with

dot_number_ns_field_id.description: Netsuite custom field ID for a Vendor's DOT Number

locked_ns_field_id.description: Netsuite custom field ID for locking a vendor or customer during an update from Shipwell

mc_number_ns_field_id.description: Netsuite custom field ID for a Vendor's MC Number

service_date_ns_field_id.description: Netsuite custom field ID on a bill or invoice to hold when the original service date occurred

shipment_id_ns_field_id.description: Netsuite custom field ID for the Shipment reference number for a bill or invoice
